extension.valueString: Step 1. Add all codes found using the following LOINC query: cocaine (=system:Urine)

name: cocaine_urine_drug_screening_tests
title: Cocaine urine drug screening tests
publisher: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
description: Urine tests for cocaine and cocaine metabolites
purpose: Identification of urine drug tests where results can be used when considering pain management therapy
